name: Death is good... but not always!
name_original: Death is good... but not always!
description:
Play on fullscreen. Commands:

Use ARROW KEYS to move and SPACE to shoot (special level).

Description:

In this miscellaneous combination of nostalgia, puzzles and glitches, death is not only good, but also essential for progression. We hope you enjoy being a glitched snake trapped inside the indestructible Nokia 3310.

Created by: Diogo Gaspar, José Agrela, Mário Balsemão

Walkthrough:
  • First level: Suicide by hitting yourself;
  • Second level: Kill the spaceships 3 times each;
  • Third level: Complete the puzzle;
  • Fourth level: Eat the letters for a spooky word!
